ratings.comment: Molly is my favorite professor ever (and I'm a junior). I took two classes with her and want to take more. She is super helpful, really cares about her students, and she's funny. If you're a philosophy major, this is a pretty easy A. If you're not, you can still get an A, especially if you go talk to her a lot. Side note: she teaches at UNC now.
The most impressive TA I have ever had. Knows the stuff inside and out. Scary smart and logical but also really nice and super helpful. So good at explaining things.

She is a fantastic lecturer. I wasn't a fan that the lectures were mandatory, but the class was still good. The papers and quizzes did require thought, so it wasn't a blow off class. But Molly was ALWAYS there to help her students. Very caring, highly recommend any class with her. She is helpful and always available. Goes above and beyond to help.

Ms. Gardner is a fantastic TA.  She knows the material and explains it very clearly without dumbing it down.  If you need help outside of class, she goes out of her way to accommodate you.  She should be the instructor!
